products.name: Bologna European Oak Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Bolognapromises an economical choice for Chevron within our Rustic grade selection and we assure you that it will give a modern feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its classic European White Oak color and style combination. This distinctive wood floor is cured with layers of UV Oil to achieve both natural feel and look while maintaining excellent protection. Together with wire brushing and finish treatments, these floors boast an elegant texture while keeping a sleek presentation. For ongoing care and maintenance to preserve the timeless allure of your Bologna wood floors, we recommend usingWOCAor BONA hardwood floor products.

products.name: Latteo HB European Oak Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Latteo HB (Herringbone)is classic Natural European White Oak color and style combination. This distinctive wood floor is cured with layers of UV Lacquer Finish to create both a natural feel and look while maintaining excellent protection. It is cut in a beautiful herringbone pattern.

details.finish: Matte UV Urethane Aluminum Oxide Finish
